sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './GamePage.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { deleteItemFromCart, setItemInCart } from '../../store/cartSlise/getCartSlise' import Button from '../../components/button/Button' const GamePage = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const item = useSelector(state => state.game.gameState) const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart.cartState) const haveIdItem = cart.some((some) => some.id === item.id) if(!item) return null return (<>

{ item.title }

{item.description}

метки для этого продукта:

{ item.genres.map((genre, id) => (
{genre}
) ) }
{item.price} руб
) } export default GamePage
